website_summaries.verdict: Easy to use with some nice extra features that aren't available with many other brands.
pros: Features a flat-bottomed infuser basket to make filling easy
Includes a freezable gel pack to keep water cold
The 32-ounce bottle comes with a flip top lid
cons: The gel pack does take away space from the infuser
Some buyers had issues with the silicone ring

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: Was so excited to get this product until I unscrewed the lid and found the inner silicone ring to be mangled up inside. And even worse, it wasn’t even the right size for the lid itself. I emailed the company in the hopes that they might respond and make restitution however so far I have heard nothing. What a disappointment. I will be returning this product as it’s completely useless without the silicon ring in place to keep it from leaking.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t order
customer_reviews.text: This bottle feels like a cheap plastic. I noticed after a month of use that the seal leaks. Its honestly a bit over rated... the fruit goes through the hole you drink out of and sometimes get choked by that. I really wanted to love this. But it’s an overpriced water bottle. Update 4/20/18 The button on the water bottle is now broken and won’t stay in. After only owning this for a month and a half it’s useless.
customer_reviews.author: fhlgurl13

customer_reviews.title: Do you want plastic flavored water?!
customer_reviews.text: Nope. Dont buy this. I used it and it made my water foul tasting. The smell (barf). I have washed this with warm, soapy water 3 times, AND put it in the dishwasher, AND sanitized it- I CANT GET THE PLASTIC SMELL TO GO AWAY. IT ABSOLUTELY MADE MY WATER TASTE DISGUSTING. The water tatstes like plastic. So gross. I wouldnt even let my son drink from this because its terrible and has to be bad for your body to taint the water taste. I used this without the fruit infuser. Just awful.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I’m FINALLY drinking more water!  Love this!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this! It makes me drink more water (I carry a Hydroflask around wherever I go, yet don’t drink much - I’ve always been bad about drinking enough water). I first tried frozen chopped squares of watermelon (put on parchment paper, on a cookie sheet & stick in the freezer) & just switched to frozen slices of cucumber. I like how it has a time chart on the bottle so you can track your water consumption, which is easy to do since the water tastes better. It also comes with a gel-ice thing that you can freeze & attach it within the water bottle to keep the water cold. I’ve recommended this bottle to many people!
customer_reviews.author: Betsy Raimondi

customer_reviews.title: Cheap production
customer_reviews.text: Please do not waste you time on this product, within 20 days it broke. The lid would not close and started to leak. If you are looking for something cheap I guess this would be an okay option. The gel pack is basically useless and does not keep you drink chill. Also, side note, it is only 32 oz. without any of the accessories. The sleeve is also very difficult to fit over the bottle and does not fit quite right.
customer_reviews.author: Jalice

customer_reviews.title: Brand new. Sleeve torn when unpacked.
customer_reviews.text: I haven't tried the rest yet, but finding the sleeve have a tear right off the bat is annoying. Shoddy workmanship and obviously no quality control. I only hope it really is BPA-free and not a con, but the lack of quality control and made in China does not bode well. I will update after I see if the rest is as bad. UPDATE: Will be returning. The plastic does not feel as sturdy as it should. The design is not very good, with no screen between the open mouth and the infuser.
customer_reviews.author: M. E. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Overall Great
customer_reviews.text: I've been looking for a good sized water bottle that is easy to clean as I go through so many water bottles that either break or don't get clean properly. The top of this bottle is wide enough that I can really get my hand and sponge in there to clean the bottom. The spout is easy to clean as well. The top dome that covers the spout is quite breakable, however. Within 5 days, my cat knocked it over and a piece broke off but thanks to superglue it seems to be holding up. Just have to be careful for that. The sleeve and ice ball is a nice touch!
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: I Like Mine, But....
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased four so far for friends and family members and recently purchased another for me. Mine leaks and so I asked others if they were having problems and yes, they all leak. You have to be very careful not to tighten too much. And pay very close attention that the lid doesn't go on crooked. I just use a straw to avoid any accidents. I really like how you can keep on track with your water consumption and the "sweat shirt" it comes with. The ice thingy doesn't keep my water cool enough - but that's me.
customer_reviews.author: Hanklyn

customer_reviews.title: Very innovative design which promotes drinking more water!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this infuser bottle! I read reviews about people stating that it gave them reason to drink more water. I'll have the say that they are correct! I don't remember looking forward to water as I have. I like that the bottle is aesthetically pleasing and very easy to handle. The additional cooling attachment makes the bottle stand out from the rest. I have not had any issues with the materials but I'll be careful to hand wash it to preserve its appearance for as long as possible. Great product!!
customer_reviews.author: Innovative Woman

customer_reviews.title: Sorry, didn't work.
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews about issues with the pop top lid not working. Believe them. I had hoped the issue was fixed by the time I ordered this product as it was exactly what I needed. However, the pop top lid didn't work at all, I had to unscrew the lid to drink out of it. In addition, I could not get the ice ball to stay on the infuser, which is the reason I bought this. I had to return it. If this product is improved I still would like to give it a try.
customer_reviews.author: lucyarlene

customer_reviews.title: Yuck
customer_reviews.text: The bottle itself is nice and the idea of it is great which is why I got it. But it has the most disgusting plastic taste. If you leave water in it for more than an hour the water tastes like plastic. Not sure how other people haven’t had this issue but I’ve trues cleaning it with soap, vinegar, baking soda... It helps for maybe half a day then the bad taste comes back.
customer_reviews.author: tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Not as expected
customer_reviews.text: With all the great reviews out their, I went ahead and purchased this bottle. I liked the sleeve that came with it, even though it was a little difficult to get on. My issue was with the drinking spout and fruit screen. The fruit screen had big openings in it right under the drinking spout, so if you had lemons or oranges, the seeds would come through, posing a choking hazard. Also, the infuser part you would have to cut up the fruit kind of small, therefore, possibly coming through the badly designed fruit screen. Sent back.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki JS

customer_reviews.title: Not happy. Overpriced then overcharged.
customer_reviews.text: First of all, after buying this at its already steep price, I checked my Amazon card info to find out I was actually OVERCHARGED by the company. Meaning they charged me more than what the product was listed for. Then of course after buying this mediocre water bottle, I see almost the same exact infuser bottle for about $7. My water bottle leaks and the latch system that keeps the lid on fails constantly. I feel completely burned and very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: which is great for the office
customer_reviews.text: It leaks. Big, juicy leaks down my front all day long whenever I take a drink, which is great for the office. The leaks appear to come from the rectangular place in the bottle mouth where the spout meets the access button. I've had the entire cap off, dried every potential leak I could find from filling of the bottle/in the screws which thread the lid on, re-tightened the entire cap afterwards. Leaks still abound.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase, with even better customer service & follow-up.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 2 Bevgo fruit water infusers...One for me & the other for my wife....We couldn't be happier. ....They are indestructible, built to last, and give the perfect infusion. ...Gonna go buy a few more for the kids as well because they are very jealous....I have now heard several times from customer service, giving tips, checking on my satisfaction, and just saying thanks....You could never get this kind of personalized service from the big companies....
customer_reviews.author: winkl

customer_reviews.title: Weird taste
customer_reviews.text: The product is well made and comes with everything pictured, BUT it makes water taste odd. I’ve ruled out every other possible cause I can think of: I wash it by hand, I’ve never left it in the sun, and the water I drink is filtered. The cup itself makes water taste like plastic. If you drink fruit infused water it may mask the taste.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: I love this water bottle and have received so many compliments ...
customer_reviews.text: I love this water bottle and have received so many compliments while using it. The fact that it comes with a little detachable ice pack is great because summer is approaching and I need cold water at all times! The water bottle is big but very fashionable and functional at the same time. The best aspect of this water bottle is the fact that it has a time tracker as to where you should be with your water supply, I thought I wasn't going to be able to drink over 64 ounces of water a day but the tracker kind of makes it a challenge to see if I can drink the amount of water by a certain time.
customer_reviews.author: Keara

customer_reviews.title: Helps keep you on track.
customer_reviews.text: I need to drink more water to help prevent kidney stones. After my last episode, my daughter recommended something similar to this to help keep track of what I drink. I learned, quickly, that I was not drinking near the water I thought I was. I have this on my desk at work and the times help me to remember to drink. There are a few times I have had to chug some water when I have noticed I didn't drink anything that hour. I have not used the infuser so cannot speak to that. If visualizing something helps you, this is the water bottle for you.
customer_reviews.author: MotleyHorseLover

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: No issues with leaking or popping lid- make sure to latch lid- don’t bother with the ice gel thing- pain in arse- I don’t even use the fruit tube- I load a bunch of fruit into the bottom part, add water, put in fridge over night and next morning, excellent fruit water to start my day- I fill up 3-4 times a day- I don’t have issues with bits of fruit coming through - i don’t use the sleeve- it’s a regular water bottle😄
customer_reviews.author: Evi

customer_reviews.title: Refreshing
customer_reviews.text: Great-sized water bottle, infusing holder can fit a decent amount of fruit, detachable gel-ice cube is pretty neat and does help with keeping drink cooler longer, bottle sleeve is handy to avoid condensation and dripping. For whatever reason, my bottle will leak occasionally; don't know why, pretty sure I've got the lid on as tight as it'll go. Overall, I really like this water bottle and it keeps me motivated/helps me to remember to stay hydrated.
customer_reviews.author: Alexa F.

customer_reviews.title: This is a great infusion bottle
customer_reviews.text: This is a great infusion bottle. It's easy to use, and works well. I can make my own fruity drinks without the added sugar.I cut up different fruits and put them in freezer bags. When I want fruit to use in my infusion bottle, I just grab a bag from the freezer,and put the froze n fruit in the infusion basket. It's always best to make the drink the night before and leave it in the refrigerator all night. Then, in the morning, it's ready to just grab and go.The bottle is easy to disassemble and wash by hand.
customer_reviews.author: Sunnie1959

customer_reviews.title: Great infusion bottle!
customer_reviews.text: This bottle is awesome! I like the little part you can put in the freezer to keep the drink cold. Lots of room for fruit. Seals well, but easy to open. My only complaint is the loop to carry it with is a bit awkward to hold- but the loop on the soft cover is better. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: mtlver

customer_reviews.title: Cool Bottle
customer_reviews.text: The bottle was delivered in about two days and it was a great gift for my lovely wife who is on her fitness journey. It was packaged well, all of the contents were there, however there was no instruction manual. Though it's a simple device, it would help to have some instruction on how to properly use it eliminating the guess work. She loves the bottle, it even has a holding sleeve to carry it. I might get one for myself, but I actually like to chew mint leaves and cucumber shavings.
customer_reviews.author: ChriSmitty

customer_reviews.title: Beware!!! It’s defective & will leak!!!
customer_reviews.text: So sad that I bought this for my grandma for Christmas and the inside seal thing is coming off / defective and it leaks everywhere!! From another review it doesn’t look like the company is going to fix the problem either ...
customer_reviews.author: Madison

customer_reviews.title: Horrible Smell!!!
customer_reviews.text: This water bottle has the worst smell of plastic. Nothing I have tried has removed the smell. I tried soaking it in baking soda, I've tried vinegar, I've washed it with warm soap and water at least 20 times, and the smell is still there. There is also a plastic taste to the water in the bottle. I contact the company and received nothing back from them. I do not recommend buying this bottle at all.
customer_reviews.author: Yankeenoles

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT !!
customer_reviews.text: I was having the hardest time getting my water in everyday but this infuser helps tremendously! I drink 2 1/2 - 3 bottles daily. My favorite combo is mint , lemon and lime. So refreshing with every drink! I LOVE it so much I bought another one for my fiancé. I get lots of compliments and questions about the cup. It's perfect! Other combos I have tried and liked- watermelon alone, pineapple with strawberry and raspberry with lime. ALL so good!!! Get yourself this cup!! It's been life changing lol
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Combs

customer_reviews.title: They make you download their link for info
customer_reviews.text: It works as a water bottle, but the infusion process didn't make the water taste better. My daughter stopped using hers, I'm still going to try more recipes, but in order to get them you have to take up space on your device by downloading their website...that is a huge hassle and a way for them to grab your email address. They should have put more information in their instructions. You can't use it out of the box because they emphasize going to their website first. I was excited about a healthy way to drink more water. Very attractive, and extremely well made.
customer_reviews.author: Nigel's favorite

customer_reviews.title: Only one flaw...
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this for about a week now, and am loving it! The ONLY complaint, recommendation I have is that the sleeve has no viewing window to see how much water that is left. I like the sleeve on it, due to the handle, but always have to pull the sleeve down to see what level I'm at. If the seller would fix this, I would buy another one for home and work. I have two coworkers that also have this bottle, we all have different colors. The colors are more vibrant in person than in the picture. The bottle is great, doesn't sweat or drip as long as the lid is on tight!
customer_reviews.author: Kelli Conrad

customer_reviews.title: Leak proof, works great.
customer_reviews.text: Great water bottle. I like the gel thingy for the ice. I’ve needed something that kept me on track with drinking enough water, as I’m trying to ween myself from soda. As much as possible at least. This works great. Leak proof from what I can tell, haven’t downloaded the free ebook for the recipes just yet. Soon though.
customer_reviews.author: cherie recore

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Sodastream water!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use with my sodastream water. I don’t like flat water but I do like sparkling water! I added fruit in my Bevgo and poured the sodastream water in, and Viola! Flavored sparking water. This bottle is well made, large but not too large and I love the Tiffany blue color. The rubber seal that goes over the mouthpiece when it’s closed, helps keep the carbonation as well. Very impressed!
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Makes hydration easy!
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised about how 'fancy' the cup was (it looks like something off the space shuttle). It's strong, the grip is excellent and the design amazing. The levels of hydration per hour were so easy to follow. The only thing I didn't care for was that the sleeve reeks (harsh plastic/raw neoprene) and I couldn't even swallow with such a strong odor. No problem, though- I didn't buy it for the sleeve.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Reader

customer_reviews.title: Best Infuser
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about this Infuser! The seal is great, no leaks. The cap locks, so you can throw it in your bag and go. The time on the side keeps you honest with drinking enough water. It also has a tab to hold, which is great. I looked all around for a Infuser water bottle that has everything - and this one does! If you are thinking of getting the pink one - my only complaint - it's like a neon pink. I'm buying another one for a friend who just had a baby. It'll help keep her hydrated and her other child won't be able to get into it or spill it.
customer_reviews.author: LMR

customer_reviews.title: Over all it is a great water bottle to keep track if water intake and meet measurable goals!
customer_reviews.text: Love this cup! This is my second one However, first one did not have the extras that came with this one So I’m loving the fruit infuser Love the sleeve bc it makes it way easier to carry However, I don’t like that you can not see through it with the sleeve on Also the sleeve is VERY tight & hard to put on/pull off Hopefully with time it’ll loosen up
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Infuser Bottle
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this infuser bottle almost daily since I bought it earlier this year. I love this bottle. It has never leaked. It's easy to fill the basket and insert it into the bottle. The only complaint I have is that the times printed on the side have mostly worn off and I do use them to gauge my water intake. Other than that, I can't think of a single thing wrong with the bottle. I have a hard time drinking enough plain water throughout the day so the fact that I can add flavor (lemon and basil is my current favorite combo) makes me actually want to drink it.
customer_reviews.author: Kim G.

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love this water bottle! I have a hard time drinking water and really need a reminder to do so. I found out about the "Increment Bottle" that is designed in Ireland, but takes 30-35 days for deliver. And these are also handmade which adds to the time. Discouraged, I found this bottle, and it works like a charm. It might not have the "giant water drops" on it but I really like how it has the times (morning starting at 8 and the last ending at 5 in the evening). I need what kick in the but needed to motivate me to drink water. All-in-all, I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Carolina Blue

customer_reviews.title: LURVE this Water Bottle!
customer_reviews.text: I am in love with the water bottle! Not only does it remind me that I need to drink, but the amount that I need to drink to ensure proper hydration. I also love that I have the infuser to add the fruits I need, with it getting all messy but also has a cold pack that I use to make my drink colder. And last but not least, I love the carry case; it keeps my water nice and cold and I can carry it with me anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Fogell

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I like how big it is and how easy to use/clean, but the top isn't 100% leak-proof. The little rubber seal was misshapen and I couldn't get it to fit the lid properly. Everything else is great, though! I do wish it had come with directions, though, since I'm not sure if the bottom part of the infuser can be frozen or not? Hopefully Google will help me figure that out. The bottle does come with a free downloadable eBook of recipes, but I haven't used any yet, so I will update this review once I do.
customer_reviews.author: cynthiae

customer_reviews.title: Great bottle but hard to clean.
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't spill even when tossed sideways in my bag. Easy to use and nice looking. It would get a perfect score if I wasn't for cleaning issues. I was not a fan of the difficulty in cleaning the plastic ring at the top as it can easily get moldy if you aren't deligent in cleaning. Otherwise perfect bottle that I use daily!
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Roberge

customer_reviews.title: It’s only OK
customer_reviews.text: It doesn’t look high quality and it’s not 32oz or at least it doesn’t hold 32oz of water, it holds about 28oz. Also it comes with a giant BPA free sticker which then now has left a sticker residue on the bottle. Surely there must be better bottles out there than this.
customer_reviews.author: Pegah

customer_reviews.title: This is a great way to get the benefits throughout the day
customer_reviews.text: I've recently committed to several lifestyle changes, most essentially, adding fruits and veggies to my diet. This is a great way to get the benefits throughout the day, and for a person who has never been one to gravitate towards fruits and veggies, this makes the lifestyle change much easier. I feel great with lemon and lime slices in here, it really seems to detoxify.
customer_reviews.author: Myra Lieb

customer_reviews.title: Best bang for your buck!
customer_reviews.text: This is definitely the best infuser you'll find for the price you pay. Comes with the ice clip and carry case. The lid is dual locking so no spills and I really like the time chart on the side. The carrying case is very snug so you can attach it to a bag without fear of it falling out. This seller also has replacement lids for any future drops.
customer_reviews.author: Sami

customer_reviews.title: Great find + purchase!
customer_reviews.text: For what it is worth --- this is a very high quality water bottle. I have not used it to its full capabilities (that is, adding fruits into the middle), but it is really good with water. The little spout (or whatever you want to call it) is a great shape, and it makes drinking easy. I love the snapping lid, as well as the little metal device that locks it into place. All of this probably sounds crazy... but I promise it is really good. 10/10 recommend.
customer_reviews.author: MrsMariONeal

customer_reviews.title: Decent, but I should have paid closer attention to the product photos.
customer_reviews.text: The water bottle works just fine and I haven't had any issues. However, the times listed on the bottle go from 8am-5pm. I'd say most people drink water beyond 5pm everyday. It's not a huge deal, I just disregard the times on the bottle and try to drink 2-3 refills a day. If I would've paid more attention, I probably would have chosen a different product.
customer_reviews.author: Ams1221

customer_reviews.title: Smell is horrible!!
customer_reviews.text: The concept of the bottle is great!! Buuut goodness, it smells horrendous. Like toxic plastic!! I washed by hand about 3-4 times and can smell it every time I drink. Honestly, I can even “taste” that awful smell. I guess I have to keep looking for a better option :(
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Drastically Helped Me Make Drinking Water a Habit (but some bottles may be defective)
customer_reviews.text: The timetable on the side really was a game changer - I get a minimum of 64oz everyday just from using this at work. The ink outside the bottle hasn't faded at all! It's durable and my favorite water bottle. [EDIT 2/20] I bought a second bottle for home since I loved the first one so much, but the silicone ring inside the lid is warped and thus its prone to leaking. Still a great purchase, but check your silicone ring when it arrives.
customer_reviews.author: K.Whitehead

customer_reviews.title: They thought of everything!
customer_reviews.text: Finally I enjoy drinking water! The delicate flavor of fresh lemon slices is just right, not to little, not too much. The hourly reminders make it easy to keep sipping throughout the day. Visually it is wonderful - clear clean lines and surfaces, and the water and fruit inside look very inviting. The cap flips open and stays open while you are drinking. When you close the cap it is secure with no chance of a spill. The option to freeze the bead cup is easy to use and effective. They thought of everything!
customer_reviews.author: Vici

customer_reviews.title: Durable, large water bottle, with nice sized infuser.
customer_reviews.text: I love this bottle. I generally only use it with sliced lemons, but that's good enough for me. Nice sized bottle. I take it everywhere and use it every day because its so extremely durable and built with real strong thick plastic. Keeping a few lemons in the infuser has made me want to drink more water by tasting more fruit flavor. As for any health benefits besides hydrating more, I couldn't speak to that. Your actually wasting money and thorwing away fibre by NOT eating the fruit and just drinking water, but if you just keep it simple and don't want a n entire fruit, this works great!
customer_reviews.author: RDJ

customer_reviews.title: Don't settle for imitations for this bottle
customer_reviews.text: Love the wide driving spout. The easy to screw on lid with perfectly aligned threads (So no dripping). The timer marks are great. The neoprene bag to keep your desk drip free and drinks cooler is great. I bought a cheaper knock off when my first one became lost in a move recently and I regretted it. Don't waste your money on knock offs. Go for the original.
customer_reviews.author: itsmecarla

customer_reviews.title: Been using this for two days and I have greatly ...
customer_reviews.text: Been using this for two days and I have greatly increased my water intake. The ice capsule and infuser are just added bonuses! One note to the producers/packagers: don't put the insulating sleeve inside the bottle. It has left a chemical smell and taste hay I haven't been able to get rid of after several days of soaking over night. I'm going to try soaking with baking soda next.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Pidgeon

customer_reviews.title: I really wanted to love this!
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited about this water bottle & I’ve used it often for the last 3 months. While I love the size, I had more complaints than love. It sweats really bad, and the numbers are faded off already. I have officially quit using it because the rubber ring on the top broke which means the top bops me in the nose every time I take a sip! :) Nice concept but I’m not sure this was made for daily use which is what I’m looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Calewis

customer_reviews.title: Originally giving it 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this bottle, after surgery this really helped me get my water intake in. however about a month after daily use the bottle started to leak. I noticed the ring (seal) was coming off. I would put the seal back into place but when I close the bottle it would do it again. Now I just have a leaky bottle =( Wanted to give this a higher rating but I just can't.
customer_reviews.author: Lisette Serrano

customer_reviews.title: Infuser Shape Questionable
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to receive my Bevgo Water Bottle as we are on a mission at work to successfully drink 64oz of water each day. Today, I proudly brought in my new Bevgo bottle. As I was filling it up, I sat the infuser on the counter in our break room and was quickly questioned by many individuals as to what I brought to work. Bevgo, I would strongly encourage your design team to revisit their shape choice for their infuser in this bottle as it very much resembles the male anatomy when the detachable ice gel ball is connected. Thankfully this piece can be removed but...just a thought to consider!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Awesome infuser water bottle!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this infuser water bottle based on all the positive comments from reviewers. The amount of fruit that fits in the infuser is just right for the amount of water in the bottle - the light taste is similar to the yummy water at the spa. The bottle doesn't leak. It fits nicely in your hand. The fruit stays in the infuser (doesn't float around in the bottle). I have tried a couple of recipes for detox, and to reduce belly fat. All the parts are easy to clean, The bottle and its components are very well made. Not only are you hydrating, your body is getting important nutrients. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Leak proof and great hydration
customer_reviews.text: I love the timeline on the side of the bottle. Keeps me hydrated throughout the day. Some days I don't have time to cut up some fruit so I put a bag of green tea or any other flavored tea to infuse overnight and it makes for a good amount of iced tea the next day. I only wish this product came in black with the timeline. I got the green one for my boyfriend. It's still a little girly-looking. Not horrible but still does the trick. I purchased the pink one for myself. It looks really adorable. I like the grip the sides. Also like the fact that it's leak-proof. Great for my commute to work!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: BEST DIFFUSER EVER!!!
customer_reviews.text: I'd previously purchased infuser bottles but none compared to this one. OMG this bevgo diffuser is the BEST on the market. Made very well. Has so many neat parts to it. I loved mine so much I bought a few more as gifts and they went crazy over theirs. If you are looking for a fruit/vegetable diffuser I wouldn't look any further. YOU NEED NOT LOOK ANY FURTHER, BUY THIS ONE!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mel Harrison

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Just opened the package and I am very happy with my purchase. I am bottle heaven. 😍😍😍. It's was neatly packaged and so well thought out. I just started using it today and it stays cold. The way it feels in my hand is so comfortable. These guys/gals really did a fantastic job with this design.
customer_reviews.author: ms.sunshine

customer_reviews.title: missing parts 2 times
customer_reviews.text: I order 2 of these bottles,one in purple and 1 in black. The black one did not have the gel ball or thermal cover. Sent back. Re-orderd black one same thing no gel ball or cover. Will be sending back again.
customer_reviews.author: JAVACIZE

customer_reviews.title: loving my Infuser water bottle
customer_reviews.text: I love this product so much. This infuser water bottle has been the only thing that I used since I have purchased it. Loving the fact that I can put all types of fruit in my water bottle in its own compartment.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hesitant at first but glad I purchased!
customer_reviews.text: I've had my bottle for about a week now and it's a necessary part of my daily life now. Nothing wakes me up like those first few sips of lemon water. I was hesitate to buy it at first due to a few bad reviews but I'm glad I did. I haven't had any issues with the lid, residue on the basket, or anything like that. Sometimes it can be a bit complicated to attach the basket to the holder but it always works after a minute of using my brain and not getting frustrated. Everything is easy to clean but I suggest you get a bottle cleaner brush if you don't have one, it makes it so much easier.
customer_reviews.author: Natasha

customer_reviews.title: Kind of sucks cause it was going to be my second bottle ...
customer_reviews.text: Has an odd taste no matter what I do and I don't understand why. I've washed it so many times with so many types of soaps. Let it soak. Try to make really strong tea in it to get rid of the taste. Everything I could think of. Cant get rid of the off taste at all. Kind of sucks cause it was going to be my second bottle of water that i carry to work. Cant use it for anything now.
customer_reviews.author: Eun♡

customer_reviews.title: HELPS WITH YOUR DAILY WATER INTAKE!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE LOVE LOVE this bottle!!! I was trying to find a way to get my daily water intake and this has helped tremendously!! It's very easy and sturdy, there is no leaking and no bad chemical taste. I simply fill with my fruit, add water, place in refrigerator and in the morning grab it and head to work. I've been experimenting with a few different fruit flavors, this has definitely been a huge help in making me drink my water. Most times I'm done with my first 32oz before 10am! I fill it up again and drink the rest before end of day. Done! So easy!! Also, shipping was fantastic!
customer_reviews.author: Sprinklesღ♥^_^

customer_reviews.title: So happy!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great way to get you're water in! The times are even on the cover! It's great infusing it with fruit! The fruit does take up some room so what I do is mash the fruit up as much as possible and then I add cold water. They also enclose a card with a website for a free downloadable ebook of recipes! Which I apparently I had no clue that you get an ebook with purchase. The ebook has so many recipes!!! Much more than just say lemon with water!
customer_reviews.author: Kasidy

customer_reviews.title: Love this water bottle!
customer_reviews.text: Good size and easy to get in the recommended 64 oz. of water a day, with one refill during the day. The only drawback is the sleeve that comes with the water bottle. Once you put on the sleeve, you can't see the actual water bottle, which is why I wanted the water bottle so I can see it and know how much water I have had so far. Otherwise, I am pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: BrentwoodMom

customer_reviews.title: It breaks easily, but This is a great water bottle for people who have trouble getting in 64 oz of water a day.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this water bottle because it looked nice and it has a timetable on it so that I stay on track. I used to dring 3 cups of water a day MAX so I bought this. I generally drink more water when it's out of a bottle than a cup. I highly recommend this too anyone. UPDATE: The quality is not amazing and the mechanism for the button to open the cap broke.
customer_reviews.author: Prokop

customer_reviews.title: Not as advertised! Do NOT buy!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my mother-in-law for part of her birthday present - she wants to start drinking more water. Bought this because of the timeline tracker, and the different way the fruit is added. NO markings on bottle whatsoever. Lid does not work right, either! Total junk!! Had it shipped - she lives in a different state - so not going to be able to return it. Very disappointed!!
customer_reviews.author: Pam B.

customer_reviews.title: This is a great little device
customer_reviews.text: I have some longevity concerns about the "ice ball holder" -- but... This is a great little device. It adds some color into the mundane task of hydrating yourself. This little bit of color is necessary for those of us who have an unhealthy dependency on other liquids. Hopefully the innards of this bottle hold up to the test of time, it has been a useful tool thus far.
customer_reviews.author: Cryph

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love this bottle!!!
customer_reviews.text: I recently had gastric bypass surgery and need to keep track of my liquid intake. This bottle is exactly what I was looking for! I can’t drink from a straw anymore and love the flip top and small spout for sipping. No more spilling all over myself! I can’t wait to use the basket to infuse my fruity protein drinks(they tend to have an after taste). I appreciate the sleeve to help keep my bottle cool, and I really like the grip of the bottle. I definitely will get a ton of use out it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is a great water bottle and infusion works nicely
customer_reviews.text: This is a great water bottle and infusion works nicely. No issues with the lid and love the big size. If I had to give one recommendation or suggestion for improvement: I would say if possible to make the infuser/inside basket "click" into place, instead of just trying to push/shove it in place... as if its not sealed perfectly (like the infuser to be tilted for example), it can leak a little bit. Not sure if this is possible or not but just a suggestion/recommedation for the company to look into. All in all great and not knocking any star(s) for that.
customer_reviews.author: TX_BSE

customer_reviews.title: This one is way better because the fruit holding piece not only will stand ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this after my daughter ordered a cheaper one that looks almost identical. This one is way better because the fruit holding piece not only will stand up on its own, but also fits into the bottle more easily. I also like the detachable ice pack, and the way that I don't have to unscrew anything to drink. You just hit the button, and it pops open. You can also lock that button for clumsy people like me.
customer_reviews.author: won't admit it bought this

customer_reviews.title: Encourages drinking more often
customer_reviews.text: For me, I bought this water bottle because I knew I was not drinking enough water, simply because I would forget. But as a nursing mother and the summer approaching, I can’t afford to not drink the recommended amount. This has definitely helped! I can now visually see how well I am doing. Leaving off a star because I left it on the couch and it did leak a lot out, the cap was on but I’m not sure how it seeped out. I am just careful to leave it upright now.
customer_reviews.author: Melina

customer_reviews.title: Teacher Win
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product because as a teacher I am horrible about drinking enough water all day. Seeing the visual guide really helps me to drink more. I do not use the infuser much, and have no issues with it leaking without it. I love how it opens and locks. I also really like how the lid is designed so it's easy to clean and no areas to worry about mold.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke

customer_reviews.title: IT IS DISHWASHER SAFE!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife to replace a similar infuser water bottle that she bought at a cheap department store. I didn't know that her old one was not supposed to go in the dishwasher and it melted. This new one "Bevgo Infuser Water Bottle" has already gone through the dishwasher and it retained its shape. My wife loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Jessie P.

customer_reviews.title: Keeps me on track......
customer_reviews.text: Love this bottle it keeps me on track with my water intake. The fruit infuser is also great and I love that it comes with an ice pack that can attach to the infuser and that it comes with a sleeve. My only issue is the ice pack does not keep my water cold for too long and it is a struggle to get the bottle into the sleeve that came with the bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Leon Theodore

customer_reviews.title: CUPS ARE NOT LEAK PROOF . POOR QUALITY !
customer_reviews.text: I PURCHASE TWO OF THESE CUPS IN HOPES THAT I WAS MAKING THE RIGHT CHOICE . THE PLASTIC CLOSURE PIECE ON THE TOP HAS DISAPPEARED OFF OF BOTH CUPS, WHICH CAUSES CUPS TO LEAK . WASTE OF MY MONEY . THE CUPS WERE ONLY BEING HAND WASHED AND ITS HASN'T EVEN BEEN THREE WEEKS . AM i ABLE TO GET A REFUND?
customer_reviews.author: kristina

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: You can put ice in the bottle put the insulator covering on it and it will keep the ice for several hours.. Love being able to have a different flavor water each day. You will enjoy this bottle. Work great on the treadmill because it fits in the cup holder.
customer_reviews.author: tommy

customer_reviews.title: LOVE my infused water!
customer_reviews.text: I have 4 of these water bottles now. What a great purchase. I drink my infused water every day. The bottle comes with an online book of recipes. You'll never get bored with your infused water. The basket on the inside holds a good amt of fruit and keeps it all contained. Only fruit with little pieces like grapefruit or other citrus fruit may end up floating in your water. The top is very nice. When you close it, it has a seal that fits on the water spout so it doesn't spill. There is also a sturdy plastic loop that can be put on a hook on your bag.
customer_reviews.author: JCamp

customer_reviews.title: It has everything I was looking for (time-line and diffuser) and also has what I didn't know I needed (the gel ice attachment) T
customer_reviews.text: This water bottle is seriously the bee's knees! I never know time-line bottles existed until I saw a sponsored product on my Facebook feed, That brought me to look for similar items on Amazon. It has everything I was looking for (time-line and diffuser) and also has what I didn't know I needed (the gel ice attachment) This is a very high quality product at a great price. This product gives me accountability to stay hydrated. I also love the silicone grip, and the double insulation means no condensation on the outside, super happy!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Parker's Mom

customer_reviews.title: The best water bottle!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product multiple times. I initially order this product for myself and a friend last December. She loved it so much she asked me to order more to be given as gifts to friends. I've recommended this product to many people that have seen me using it. Additionally, I can be a little clumsy. I've dropped this product numerous times and it's proven it's durability.
customer_reviews.author: Yidaa

customer_reviews.title: Awesome water bottle!
customer_reviews.text: I am not a water drinker at all. I love this bottle because not only can I add ingredients to flavor the water, it also helps me reach my water goal for the day with the time line marks on the bottle. They also did a good job with sending a link for various recipes and their effects. I bought myself a bottle and have since gifted it to three of my friends.
customer_reviews.author: April Dawn

customer_reviews.title: I love this infuser bottle
customer_reviews.text: I love this infuser bottle! The only reason I gave 4 stars instead of 5 is because of the bottle sleeve, I have a hard time getting it all the way on the bottle and I can't see how much I drink with it on if I'm going by the hourly times on the bottle. So I have to take it off constantly for that. Otherwise I absolutely love this infuser! Works great!
customer_reviews.author: Lee Ann

customer_reviews.title: Will be buying more!
customer_reviews.text: No leaking! Great flavor. I use frozen fruit. It does sweat a little, I just put a thin koozie on it. It is important about the no leakage if upside down or knocked over, as I work around electronics on a hospital floor and the sealing lid is important to keep out "bugs". Would definitely recommend this product and am considering buying a couple more, one more for myself and several as gifts for fellow nurses. BTW, it really does help if you are using frozen fruit, that you 'mush' it abit so that it will better infuse. Its nice to have that midafternoon fruit snack, too.
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Love, love, love it
customer_reviews.text: I am not a water drinker but this makes me stick to a schedule and add fresh fruit or mint. I like to drink water now that I can infuse it. Only issue is the time numbers have worn off with daily use for 1 month. The bottle is still in great shape, still leak proof.
customer_reviews.author: Megn Alia

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last long, leaks and handle broke off
customer_reviews.text: Got this bc of the great reviews. This worked great for about 2 uses. I loved the rubber on the side, the design of the lid, and the ease of the infuser part. Third use, the plastic handle broke off. Fifth use, the lid started leaking and had to clean it up in my purse and car. Don't know if it was a fluke, but I was hoping to get much more use out of this for the price. Perhaps if you don't take it with you to places, it will last longer, but I was looking for a reliable travel bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Flavored Water Done Right
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy water bottle with a very well designed infuser. I've only been using it a week and have found that is serves my purposes very well. The bottle is a good size to place into my laptop bag or clip it on (I bought a separate attachment for that) to anything. Fruits stay in the infuser and slowly diffuse into the water. Shaking up the bottle doesn't make it leak, which is great, since I normally carry the bottle with me as I walk around the office. The material is also sturdy, no scratches on it either. I think I might get another to keep at home!
customer_reviews.author: Sruthi

customer_reviews.title: Has all the features at a great price
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my wife as she needed an extra for work. After looking at several brands and models (about 40 different ones), I decided to go with this one. Purchased primary due to large capacity, has reusable ice ball, has locking cap, has a grip, and included a condensation cover. Would definitely purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: PH_Brewer

customer_reviews.title: It's a great bottle and helps me drink more water!
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with this purchase. I've used this product everyday since I've bought it. When it first arrived, I did soak it overnight in soapy water because there was a fairly strong plastic odor. But soaking it did the trick. I put strawberries in the diffuser when I first started using it, but, lately, I've been taking the diffuser out and simply been using the product as a straight water bottle. I bought this product because of the times on the side because I thought it would prompt me to drink more water. The times do prompt me to drink more, and I'm very happy with that aspect of the product. Overall, I would definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine

customer_reviews.title: The Bevgo Fruit Infuser Water Bottle is an awesome water bottle.
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I are water drinkers and often enjoy a slice of lemon in our glass. When I saw the Bevgo infuser bottle, I needed to try it. Well, try it I did. We each have one, Mother-in-Law too, and the pitcher as well. I love being able to leave the same lime slices, my preference, in the bottle all day and just refilling the water around them. The flavor is delightful. Beats plane water hands down. I keep the pitcher loaded and in the refrigerator. It's nice to have it to fill the dinner glasses with the same great flavor. Thank you Bevgo.
customer_reviews.author: SILVERBEAD

customer_reviews.title: Good value infuser
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty good infuser. It holds a decent amount of water and all the parts work properly. I've had infusers that leak, but this one is solid. The indicators of how much you should drink by the time of day on the side are nice. Not sure why they're there on the opaque cover, though. It's got a little ring for easy carrying and another strap on the cooler sleeve. A couple things I don't like are that it's not dishwasher safe and the infuser part doesn't go very close to the bottom. All in all, it's a pretty decent infuser, though.
customer_reviews.author: MacDiesel888

customer_reviews.title: Great Bottle
customer_reviews.text: Great multifunctional bottle just as described. Use on a daily basis. Water, protein shakes, fruit infusions. The frozen gel doesnt last too long but it wasnt the main reason I got this bottle and definitely not a deal breaker.
customer_reviews.author: Journi Moore

customer_reviews.title: Great Water Bottle
customer_reviews.text: Love this water bottle. Especially that I can infuse my water with different flavors. I also like how it has the time trackers to keep me focused on staying hydrated. I need that.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lid breaks easily
customer_reviews.text: Really wish I could give this bottle five stars, but sadly the lid broke so that I can't keep the bottle closed anymore to prevent water from spilling out. Like the infuser so I can add fruit without the added sugar. Like the interval markings to monitor my water intake. But if I can't keep the lid closed, using it as a travel water bottle, which is the reason I bought it, is no longer possible.
customer_reviews.author: Grammy

customer_reviews.title: My favorite water bottle
customer_reviews.text: It's crazy how difficult it can be to find a decent water bottle but this one has everything I was looking for. It's a good size, big enough that I'm not constantly refilling it but not so big as to be cumbersome. It doesn't leak but the spout is easy to drink from (it's amazing how many water bottles aren't safe to throw in your bag or have spouts that make you feel like you are drinking from a baby's bottle.) The infuser thing is fun, I could see getting bored with it but for now I'm enjoying making tasty, heathy flavors.
customer_reviews.author: TL

customer_reviews.title: Great water bottle that turns into a cup!
customer_reviews.text: Great water bottle that turns into a large cup. Over the years, I bought 4 of these water bottles. The cap broke on each water bottle. Drop it and the plastic cracks, bump it and the hinge breaks, etc. So now i have four lovely cups with no cap/cover
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love this big bottle
customer_reviews.text: I love this big bottle! I love how it has markings on the side that can help you keep track on how much you drink each hour. The metal ring on the lid helps to keep it secure even if you have it in the bag you know that the lid won't accidentally pop open and spill water everywhere! the infusion container is also a nice size, not too small and not too big. The material is sturdy and have been using it everyday and it has never failed me. I have not encountered any leaks or malfunctions. It's great indoors or outdoors. I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Timoteo

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!  Definitely worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these bottles (1 black, 1 purple) for my son and me. It works great. The infusion section is large enough to give your water great taste all day long and I refill it several times a day. The lid stay open when you drink and the double latch is great. Doesn't leak at all. I drink alot of water anyway but this had made me drink even more. I would definitely recommend this product or give it as a gift. Bevgo has great customer service. They immediately respond to any question or comment you have. This is one of the best purchase experiences I've had. Great product, great company!
customer_reviews.author: Hotsauce569

customer_reviews.title: I drink 6 bottles plus a day and this Bottle makes my backpack weight so much lighter and my friend is doing awesome with her water intake now
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these. One for me and one to help my friend get into the habit of drinking water. I drink 6 bottles plus a day and this Bottle makes my backpack weight so much lighter and my friend is doing awesome with her water intake now. The girls in our office loved it so i ordered another one for one of them. Very simple and easy to clean and looks cute in it's bright colors. I've yet to use the infuser but I'm sure it works great. Doesn't drip or splash out. Love this product!!!
customer_reviews.author: stephanie ann macias

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t receive the right one. Order 2 just different colors, and this one was wrong. Doesn’t have the number tracker, Cold sleeve, nor did it have the gel pack at the end.
customer_reviews.author: Carissa

customer_reviews.title: Helping me kick my soda habit!
customer_reviews.text: I decided that I wanted to drink less soda at work. This water bottle is exactly what I was hoping for. It's very easy to assemble and disassemble. The basket is a good size, I can fit a whole (small, sliced) lime in it. I am experimenting with different fruits, and it's all good so far. I really like the little latch on the top so it doesn't accidentally fly open when I am carrying it around. It's not a sport top, so I haven't tried to use it while I'm driving, but I'll bet it would be doable. It's sturdy and I hope it will last me a long time, because I am enjoying it.
customer_reviews.author: Pelba Dalrymple

customer_reviews.title: I love my Bevgo water bottle.
customer_reviews.text: I've had my Bevgo bottle a few weeks and I absolutely love it! I've only made cucumber water so far but I'm looking forward to trying other recipes. I've mainly been using it as a regular water bottle which has been amazing. I'm finding myself drinking much more water during the day. I plan on buying one to keep at work. I would definitely recommend. Great customer service as well. A++*
customer_reviews.author: MissMel821

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly infused water!
customer_reviews.text: Flavor is just what you'd expect, easy to drink fresh, flavored water without chunks of fruit in the way. Easy to clean and the size is just right. Ordering more for the rest of the family
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey M.

product_meta.title: Bevgo Fruit Infuser Water Bottle – Large 32oz - Hydration Timeline Tracker – Detachable Ice Gel Ball With Flip Top Lid
feature_bullets: BEVGO WAS THE FIRST TO - Introduce the 32oz Fruit Infuser Water Bottle to The USA - We have been Improving It Ever Since - Made From the Highest Quality Eastman Tritan Materials Including our Lid Unlike Others - New Exclusive to Bevgo Flat Bottomed Infuser Basket for Easy Infuser Basket Filling – Bevgo Exclusive Integrated Timeline on Bottle so you can Track your Hydration Wherever you Go

INSULATION SLEEVE - With Carry Handle and Exclusive to Bevgo Integrated Timeline on Bottle so you can Track your Hydration Wherever you Go Helping you Drink More Water and Cleanse You System. SIMPLE TO USE and Easy to Clean Saving You Time so You can Live Your Life to the Fullest - Large Drinking Spout and Exclusive to Bevgo Lid Placement so You Can Slam It Down Fast and Get That Burst of Flavor and Energy

DETACHABLE ICE ATTACHMENT - You Do Not Need to Fill with Ice Just Put the Ice Attachment In the Freezer and Attach to Infuser Basket for Cold Drinks Anywhere You Go - ANYWHERE, ANYTIME - The Size Allows You to Fill with a Mix of Your Favorite Fresh Fruits, Vegetables and Herbs - The Perfect Balance Between Infuser Basket Size and Amount of Water you can Fit in the Cup - Every Sip is Packed With Nutrients to Help You Detox, Lose Weight and Stay Energized

PERFECTLY BALANCED INFUSER BASKET – Tried and Tested Infuser Basket Relative to Bottle Size Allowing Maximum Fruit Infusion and Maximum Water Fill Meaning Less Fruit Wasted, More Naturally Infused Water Consumed with Less Refills – On the Go with Bevgo with Grips on Both Sides and Convenient Carry Handle Making it Easy to Drink and Carry with You - Fits in Most Car Holders Which is Great When You're On the Go - Sturdy Flip Lock Sealed Lid With Extra Latch to Avoid Those Annoying Leaks

100% BPA FREE - Reusable so you can Keep Filling All Day - Stop Buying Expensive Sugar Filled Soda, Juices, Sports Drinks and Save Your Money - MAKE HEALTH A HABIT - Hydrate Your Body by Drinking Water the Easy and Fun way - FREE eBook With Over 50 Flavor Filled Infusion Recipes and Tips to Start Improving Your Life Now. - Makes for a Perfect Christmas, Birthday, or Mothers Day Gift for Your Friend, Mom or Dad - Beware of Cheap Imitations and Be Assured With Our 100% Money back Guarantee
